column1: Smoque BBQ////The BEST mac and cheese I've found
column2: and that includes Mom's.  Every bbq item is better than the one before.  The portions aren't huge
column3: but they're adequate.  The joint is a joint
column4: but cleaner and better maintained than the one you might expect.  The service is fast and the sensory memories linger
column5: whether you eat in or take out.
